gae:update-indexes

Full name:

net.kindleit:maven-gae-plugin:0.9.6-SNAPSHOT:update-indexes

Description:

Updates datastore indexes.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
appDir String - Overrides where the Project War Directory is located.
sdkDir String - Specifies where the Google App Engine SDK is located.
Default value is: ${settings.localRepository}/com/google/appengine/appengine-java-sdk/${gae.version}/appengine-java-sdk-${gae.version}.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
appId String 0.9.3 The app id. If defined, it overrides the application name defined in the appengine-web.xml.
appVersion String 0.9.3 The app version. If defined, it overrides the application major version defined in the appengine-web.xml.
emailAccount String - Deprecated. use maven settings.xml/server/username and "serverId" parameter
encoding String 0.8.3 The character encoding scheme to be applied interacting with the SDK. Sent as the --compile_encoding flag.
Default value is: ${project.build.sourceEncoding}.
goalArguments List 0.9.4 Arbitrary list of Goal Arguments to pass along to the app engine task.
hostString String - Overrides the Host header sent with all RPCs.
keepTempUploadDir boolean - Do not delete temporary directory used in uploading.
Default value is: false.
monitorKey String - Key to provide when making stop requests.
Default value is: monitor.${project.artifactId}.
monitorPort int - Port to listen for stop requests on.
Default value is: 8081.
passIn boolean - Always read the login password from stdin.
Default value is: false.
proxy String - Tell AppCfg to use a proxy. By default will use first active proxy in maven settings.xml
serverId String - The server id in maven settings.xml to use for emailAccount(username) and password when connecting to GAE. If password present in settings "--passin" is set automatically.
splitJars boolean - Split large jar files (> 10M) into smaller fragments.
Default value is: false.
uploadServer String - The server to connect to.
wait boolean - Decides whether to wait after the server is started or to return the execution flow to the user.
Default value is: false.

Parameter Details

appDir:

Overrides where the Project War Directory is located.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • Expression: ${project.build.directory}/${project.build.finalName}

appId:

The app id. If defined, it overrides the application name defined in the appengine-web.xml.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 0.9.3
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${gae.appId}

appVersion:

The app version. If defined, it overrides the application major version defined in the appengine-web.xml.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 0.9.3
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${gae.appVersion}

emailAccount:

Deprecated. use maven settings.xml/server/username and "serverId" parameter
The username to use. Will prompt if omitted.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${gae.email}

encoding:

The character encoding scheme to be applied interacting with the SDK. Sent as the --compile_encoding flag.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Since: 0.8.3
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${encoding}
  • Default: ${project.build.sourceEncoding}

goalArguments:

Arbitrary list of Goal Arguments to pass along to the app engine task.
  • Type: java.util.List
  • Since: 0.9.4
  • Required: No

hostString:

Overrides the Host header sent with all RPCs.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${gae.host}

keepTempUploadDir:

Do not delete temporary directory used in uploading.
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${gae.keepTemps}
  • Default: false

monitorKey:

Key to provide when making stop requests.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${gae.monitor.key}
  • Default: monitor.${project.artifactId}

monitorPort:

Port to listen for stop requests on.
  • Type: int
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${gae.monitor.port}
  • Default: 8081

passIn:

Always read the login password from stdin.
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${gae.passin}
  • Default: false

proxy:

Tell AppCfg to use a proxy. By default will use first active proxy in maven settings.xml
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${gae.proxy}

sdkDir:

Specifies where the Google App Engine SDK is located.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes
  • Expression: ${gae.home}
  • Default: ${settings.localRepository}/com/google/appengine/appengine-java-sdk/${gae.version}/appengine-java-sdk-${gae.version}

serverId:

The server id in maven settings.xml to use for emailAccount(username) and password when connecting to GAE. If password present in settings "--passin" is set automatically.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${gae.serverId}

splitJars:

Split large jar files (> 10M) into smaller fragments.
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${gae.deps.split}
  • Default: false

uploadServer:

The server to connect to.
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${gae.server}

wait:

Decides whether to wait after the server is started or to return the execution flow to the user.
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • Expression: ${gae.wait}
  • Default: false
